Scien: It feels strange, being back in Nolavillia.
Scien: I feel like a stranger, like I don't deserve toreturn here...
???: Do I see what I think I see!?
???: F- F- F- FOREIGNERS!?On MY Xuirist territory?
???: Why are you on the shores of Xuirist land?
Proton: We've come from the Bipole continent, andwe just need to pass through and get to the Nationof Nation.
???: I know your Razzions are trying to invade us!
???: The one and only true god of this world is theTrue Xuir!
???: Those who worship the false god of Bobbish must beexterminated!
???: That is the mark of the Proto-Xuirs.
???: We've been searching for you Proto-Xuirs,and now you've come running at us!
???: And funniest thing is, you weren't even onthe list of escaped Proto-Xuirs to capture!
???: May the false Xuirs perish and my paycheckbe raised...
???: Eg, do I think I see what I see?
???: It's been a while since I've been in a battle.this big...
???: We must fight in this battle!
???: If we don't fight, I might end up consuming largeamounts of laundry cleaner again; and that would besomething that I'd rather not experience.
???: Will you allow the great Rethgif to fight alongsideyour forces?
[Recruit Rethgif and Eg](Q) Recruit(W) Do not recruit
Rethgif: Okay then, I'll just fight along with theother team.
[Rethgif and Eg have joined the enemy team]
Tluc: I've somehow managed to survive this encounter...
Tluc: I pledge my life to the True Xuir...
Tluc: This is a dire message to all Xuirists...
Tluc: The Generation 3 Proto-Xuir No 2 has been discovered,alive, on the western land border of the continent.
Tluc: Our squadron has been defeated, and the ProtoXuir is guarded by others.
Tluc: They are currently heading to the Nation of Nation,block off all paths to the Nolavillian Mountain Rangeimmediately.
Tluc: We must exterminate these false Xuirs.
Omega: Proto-Xuir G3 N2 has been discovered.
Break: How could he have survived for two decades withoutbeing discovered...
Omega: Tluc has been defeated by him, it seems the Proto-Xuirhas a team of his own.
Break: You must capture him immediately.
Omega: They're heading to the Nation of Nation, we'll beto capture them when they pass by the cavern.
Omega: They'll also be passing by many Xuirist villages, itspossible they may not even reach us without being captured.
Break: And do not forget the past.
